page.Customer 源代码

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

from knitter.webelement import WebElement
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By


[文档]class CustomerList():

[文档]    class CustomerItem(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//div[@class='pop-customer-list-item-name' and text()='#@CustomerName']")

        def __init__(self):
            by = WebElement.by
            value = WebElement.value


[文档]        def VerifyCustomerExistence(self, customerName, TrueOrFalse = True):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@CustomerName', customerName)
            super(CustomerList.CustomerItem, self).VerifyExistence(TrueOrFalse)



[文档]        def Click(self, customerName):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@CustomerName', customerName)
            super(CustomerList.CustomerItem, self).Click()




[文档]class AddCustomerButton(WebElement):
    (by, value) = (By.CLASS_NAME, 'pop-manage-list-title-action-item')

    (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//div[@class='form-bottom-bar-btn']//span[text()='保存']")

    (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//div[@class='form-bottom-bar-btn']//span[text()='删除']")
